Per November, Jalan Layang Antasari Jadi Lokasi Car Free Day
03 Nov 2019, 10:51 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Car Free Day di Jalan Layang Nontol Antasari. (CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Kegiatan car free day atau Hari Bebas Kendaraan Bermotor (HBKB) di wilayah Jakarta Selatan setiap Minggu akan dilaksanakan di Jalan Layang Non Tol (JLNT) Antasari mulai November ini."Sudah diputuskan berdasarkan hasil rapat kemarin, Jalan Layang Antasari jadi lokasi HBKB (car free day) mulai November ini setiap Minggu setiap bulannya," kata Kepala Suku Dinas Perhubungan Jakarta Selatan, Christianto, saat dikonfirmasi Antara di Jakarta, Minggu, (3/11)Chris mengatakan sebelum ditetapkan, HBKB atau car free day di wilayah Jakarta Selatan dilakukan dua kali dalam sebulan di dua lokasi berbeda yakni Antasari dan Mampang. Setelah dilakukan pembahasan bersama, maka diputuskan car free day secara permanen diberlakukan di Jalan Layang Antasari."Kenyamanan bagi orang berolahraga tanpa ada gangguan, karena kendaraan tetap bisa melintas di jalan bawahnya," kata Chris.Chris mengatakan Jalan Layang Antasari akan diberlakukan car free day setiap hari Minggu setiap bulannya dimulai dari pukul 06.00 sampai dengan 10.00 WIB.Adapun panjang jalan layang Antasari yang dijadikan sebagai lokasi car free day disebut dengan 'Antasari Sky Sport', lanjut Chris, kurang lebih sejauh tiga kilo meter."Selain dapat berolahraga, masyarakat juga akan dimanjakan dengan pemandangan yang indah dari lintasan Antasari Sky Sport," kata Chris.Selama kegiatan car free day berlangsung, Sudin Perhubungan Jaksel mengerahkan 50 petugas untuk melakukan pengaturan lalu lintas dan rekayasa lalu lintas bersama Kepolisian, TNI dan Satpol PP.Menurut Chris, JLNT Antasari akan ditutup di enam titik plotting yang telah ditentukan yakni di depan Bhayangkari (Mabes Polri) arah TB Simatupang, depan Bank Mandiri Syariah (Blok M) arah TB Simatupang, dan di depan Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Selatan arah TB Simatupang."Kemudian di depan Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Selatan Arah Pattimura, depan Pasar Cipete arah TB Simatupang dan depan Pasar Cipete arah Pattimura," katanya.Chris pun berharap, kegiatan Antasari Sky Sport ini dapat dimanfaatkan oleh masyarakat Jakarta Selatan untuk berolahraga, bersepeda, jalan santai, skateboard maupun kegiatan positif lainnya.(Antara/age)

As of November, Antasari Flyover Becomes a Car Free Day Location
03 Nov 2019, 10:51 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Car Free Day on Antasari Nontol Flyover. (CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Car free day activities (HBKB) in South Jakarta every Sunday will be held at Antasari Flyway (JLNT) starting this November. "It has been decided based on the results of yesterday's meeting, Jalan Antasari Flyover so the location of the HBKB (car free day) starts this November every Sunday every month, "said the Head of the South Jakarta Transportation Department, Christianto, when confirmed between in Jakarta, Sunday, (3/11) Chris said before it was set, the HBKB or car free day in the South Jakarta area, it is conducted twice a month in two different locations namely Antasari and Mampang. After a joint discussion, it was decided that the car free day would be permanently applied on the Antasari Flyway. "Comfort for people to exercise without any disturbances, because vehicles can still cross the underpass," said Chris. Chris said the Antasari Flyover will be car free day. every Sunday each month starting at 6:00 to 10:00 WIB. As for the length of the Antasari overpass which is used as a car free day location, it is called 'Antasari Sky Sport', continued Chris, approximately as far as three kilometers. "Besides being able to exercise, the community will also be spoiled with a beautiful view of the Antasari Sky Sport track, "said Chris. During the car free day activity, South Jakarta Transportation Sub-dept. mobilized 50 officers to conduct traffic management and traffic engineering with the Police, TNI and Satpol PP. According to Chris, Antasari's JLNT will be closed at six predetermined plotting points, in front of Bhayan gkari (Police Headquarters) toward TB Simatupang, in front of Bank Mandiri Syariah (Blok M) toward TB Simatupang, and in front of the South Jakarta Mayor's Office toward TB Simatupang. "Then in front of the South Jakarta Mayor's Office Pattimura Direction, in front of the Cipete Market in the direction of TB Simatupang and in front of the Cipete Market in Pattimura direction, "he said. Chris also hopes that the Antasari Sky Sport activity can be utilized by the people of South Jakarta for sports, biking, casual walking, skateboarding and other positive activities. (Antara / age)
